title: Homely Furniture Werehouse
overview: This website contain some furniture products. This website is for user and admin. User can see the products and blogs. Admin can add item, update item and delete any item.
◉ Home page 6 items displayed for user.. There is two role admin and user.
◉ A blogs page for beatiful articals.
◉ Admin can add item , Update item and delete items.
◉ Implemented login system for authorising the Clients and order how much you need.
◉ You can pay using your credit card.
◉ dashboard page they clients can order and pay for specific products. If paid, the client will see paid and TxnId.
◉ For an admin role user there in the dashboard he can cancel any unpaid order . make other admin and my profile page.
◉ This site is protected using JsonWebToken
